longInfo:
Passport required. 
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  on arrival.
 - Nationals of Congo are allowed to enter with expired (max.
   5 years) passports. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of Congo. 
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 3 months for
nationals of Congo.
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold documents for their next
  destination.
Warning:
- Nationals of Congo who have visited Congo (Dem. Rep.),
  Guinea, Liberia, Nigeria or Sierra Leone within the last 30
  days will be refused entry. 
- Visitors not holding return/onward ticket could be refused
  entry
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever required.

Exempt from Yellow Fever vaccination:
- Children under 1 year of age.
Recommended:
- Yellow fever vaccination recommended for all passengers of 9
  months of age and older going to areas south of the Sahara
  Desert.
  Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, mainly due to P.
  falciparum, exists throughout the year in the whole country.
  Recommended prevention: C.
